# by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be easily ported back to the ya build
# system may be rejected.

# Please refer to the build instructions in the repository for more information about manual
# changes in this file.

add_subdirectory(bin)

add_library(kqp-tools-combiner_perf)


target_compile_options(kqp-tools-combiner_perf PRIVATE
  -DUSE_CURRENT_UDF_ABI_VERSION
)

target_link_libraries(kqp-tools-combiner_perf PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  essentials-public-udf
  public-udf-arrow
  udf-service-exception_policy
  essentials-sql-pg_dummy
  essentials-minikql-comp_nodes
  minikql-comp_nodes-llvm16
  minikql-codegen-llvm16
  minikql-invoke_builtins-llvm16
  cpp-testing-unittest
  core-kqp-runtime
  yql-dq-comp_nodes
  llvm16-lib-IR
  lib-ExecutionEngine-MCJIT
  llvm16-lib-Linker
  llvm16-lib-Passes
  lib-Target-X86
  Target-X86-AsmParser
  Target-X86-Disassembler
  lib-Transforms-IPO
  lib-Transforms-ObjCARC
)

target_sources(kqp-tools-combiner_perf PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/kqp/tools/combiner_perf/converters.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/kqp/tools/combiner_perf/factories.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/ydb/core/kqp/tools/combiner_perf/printout.cpp

)
